pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chernoff's Distribution // Computes Chernoff's distribution based on the method in Piet Groeneboom Jon A Wellner (2001) Computing Chernoff's Distribution, Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, 10:2, 388-400, doi:10.1198/10618600152627997. Chernoff's distribution is defined as the distribution of the maximizer of the two-sided Brownian motion minus quadratic drift. That is, Z = argmax (B(t)-t^2).
